Introduction to "Yoga for Kids!" Enjoy

This will introduce the kids to a few fun poses, breathing techniques, and final relaxation with visualization.

The definition of Yoga is "union with oneself" or "yolk" (as in the center),and it is all about YOU! Yoga is at least 5,000 years old, and originated in what is now northern India. It was taught in the Sanskrit language, which many of our words came from.

Yoga is non-competitive, nor is it judgmental.

Scientific studies have concluded that combining breath work, poses, and relaxation techniques, may assist your child to help alleviate anxiety, improve concentration, and learn how to calm themselves.

My classes will start out slowly. Any pose can be modified, and Yoga is not intended to hurt.
